import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react" import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import CardDeck from 'react-bootstrap/CardDeck' import eggTart from './portuguese-egg-custard-tarts.jpg' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import database from '../firebase'; import "./Home.css"; //import Cart from "./Cart" function Home() { const [firestoreArray, setFirestoreArray] = useState([]); const db = database.firestore(); const id = "user2@gmail.com"; useEffect(() => { db.collection("FoodCollection").doc(id).collection("food").get().then(querySnapshot => { const data = querySnapshot.docs.map(doc => doc.data()); console.log(data); setFirestoreArray(data); }) }, []) return (
